segments.speaker: Taylor
segments.text: So yeah, our Q3 projections are really exciting. We're looking at a 40% increase in user engagement.

segments.speaker: Taylor
segments.text: Yeah! And the best part is we're rolling out this new feature that I've been working on for months-

segments.speaker: Taylor
segments.text: It uses machine learning to personalize the entire experience. I can tell you all about the technical architecture if you're interested!

segments.speaker: Morgan
segments.text: Yeah, um, that sounds interesting. Hey, I actually need to go say hi to someone I just spotted. But it was nice chatting!

segments.speaker: Taylor
segments.text: Oh! Sure, no problem. Maybe we can connect on LinkedIn and I can send you more details?

segments.speaker: Morgan
segments.text: Sure, sounds good. Have a good night!
